text: The inauguration ceremony of the exhibition will be held today at 3.00 p.m. under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena.This is open to the public from tomorrow (18th Aug.) from 10 a.m. to 8.p.m.The photographic exhibition Heta Dakina Ranil (Ranil who sees the future) depicting the special moments of 40 years in politics of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe will be held from today (17th Aug.) to 20th August at the BMICH. The inauguration ceremony of the exhibition will be held today at 3.00 p.m. under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena.This is open to the public from tomorrow (18th Aug.) from 10 a.m. to 8.p.m.
title: Heta Dakina Ranil begins today
